column2:
"And lastly, it's my turn...
In short, my wish appears to be to get revenge."

"I don't know why, but I have this feeling that I want to get back at someone for something...
A powerful, burning feeling."

"Perhaps getting some kind of revenge will clear my heart...
But to be honest, I have no idea at all whether that will work."
"What...? You think you can manage that? I don't quite understand, but I will trust you. I look forward to seeing what you can come up with."
